TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but the future is a radioactive wasteland.

I wish SCP-173 was my friend.

Granted, but now it's your only friend.

I wish for a book.

Granted, but now it's your only friend.

I wish for a book.

(I'm actually fine with SCP-173 being my only friend. He gives good hugs.)

Granted, but the book is the Book of Death, and you read it and die.

I wish I had a spaceship.

Granted. It's a Kerbal-grade space ship. (what did you expect?)

I wish that BBcode worked again on the forums.

Granted, but the forum shuts down shortly after.

I wish i had 800 more wishes...

Granted, but since you had infinite wishes in the first place, you didnt really have to go out of your way to limit them...

I wish that there was a zombie apocalypse.

Granted, but you're the first person to be infected.

I wish I could get a fuel module for my space station into orbit without the launch vehicle going off course and/or exploding.

Granted, but you run out of RCS, preventing you from docking.

I wish I could be a seal.

Granted, you are now Jamie Hyneman. You have a season of Mythbusters to tape, and you have no idea how to weld.

I wish that I had a 1 TB External Drive.

Granted, but you can only transfer data to/from it at a rate of 1/2 a bit per second.

I wish I could be on the Enterprise as a non-redshirt.

granted, but you're a nurse.

I wish for unlimited refills.

Granted, you get unlimited refills of water.

I wish I could sit in my room all day and just play KSP.

Granted, but you are glued to your chair.

I wish that I have multiple copies of what chobit has always wanted.

Edited May 7, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, they're all broken

I wish I had a Lahti L-39

Granted, but it is impaled through your head.

I wish for a platinum waffle.

Granted. However you make the mistake of trying to eat it.

I wish I could live in room 35 in the Odessa Dolphinarium hotel.

Granted, but the room is flooded and filled with killer dolphins.

I wish for some bronze bacon.

Granted, but the room is flooded and filled with killer dolphins.

Seriously?

About the bacon, you try to eat it.

I wish I had an F16.

Granted, but the bronze bacon is made of anti-matter pigs.

I wish for a large blueberry smoothie.

Edited May 7, 2013 by lobsterbark

Granted.

I wish for a paradox.
Granted, but UNIVERSE.exe has stopped responding.
I wish people would remember to post a wish after a corruption

Granted. Now people forget to corrupt wishes.

I wish for a bowl of the radioactive isotope Chobitium-389.

Granted, but you get it in the bowl with your breakfast.

I wish for a pet dragon.

It kills you.

I wish for a wish
